item.title: Message to David Rosembloom About Entrepreneurship and Music App
item.description: Message to David Rosembloom About Entrepreneurship and Music App I want to see this app succeed! Because of that, I will be up front about some of my concerns and experiences, should they be helpful, along the way.

item.title: [[2022-07-18]] Reflection on SIX
item.description: [[2022-07-18]] Reflection on SIX I was blown away by the SIX. SIX is a play that thrives on spectacle, but also accompanies it with substantive performances that convey more messaging than its script would ever imply.

item.title: How Spotify Is Changing Our World Forever - YouTube
item.description: How Spotify Is Changing Our World Forever - YouTube Record Labels Screw Over Spotify and Small Artists Record Labels forced Spotify to completely change their business model, and move most of their free feature behind a paywall And those Record Labels get huge chunks from that payment Record Labels also have full control over the playlists, which punishes small artists Artists only get 0.

item.title: Man's Not Hot
item.description: Man’s Not Hot A defiant piano chord resounds, its reverberations whispering through punctuated echos. A set of horns and occasional growl join its singular chorus.

item.title: The Baryton
item.description: The Baryton The Baryton is a peculiar instrument. It is a stringed instrument, played primarily with a bow, incorporating many of the properties of both the guitar and the cello.
